long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Spellbook is an elegant bookmark addon for people with too many bookmarks.

Add new bookmarks with a handy category search into suitable bookmark
folder or create a subcategory.

Shortcuts

Open the popup with Alt-S keyboard shortcut (Ctrl-Alt-S on Firefox).

Languages

The extension is currently available in the following languages: English, Finnish, French and Russian.

Features

* Add new bookmark for the current tab from the popup
* Add new subcategory
* Find the category (bookmark folder) easily by searching
* Show parent paths to easily distinguish similarly named categories
* Show recently added and child categories
* Edit name, url and category when adding a bookmark
* Popup and search works fast even with thousands of bookmarks
* Show saved bookmark state and information
* Delete existing bookmarks
* Keyboard navigation
* Open source with MPL 2.0 license

See full changelog at Github:
https://github.com/peterhil/spellbook/blob/main/CHANGELOG.md
long.fi,fr,ru:
Spellbook is an elegant bookmark organiser for people with too many bookmarks.

Current functionality:

– Add new bookmark for the current tab from the popup
– Add a new subcategory
– Find the category (folder) you want easily by searching
– Show parent paths to easily distinguish similarly named categories
– Edit name, url and category when adding a bookmark
– Popup and search works fast even with thousands of bookmarks
– Open the popup with Ctrl-B keyboard shortcut (Cmd-B on Mac)
– Show favicon
– English, Finnish, French and Russian localisations
– Open source with MPL 2.0 license

See full changelog at Github:
https://github.com/peterhil/spellbook/blob/master/CHANGELOG.md

See Github issues for planned features, features and bug reports:
https://github.com/peterhil/spellbook/issues

Motivation for writing this:

I have around 17000 bookmarks and 2000 categories, and I want to use and organise them better than the tools provided by current browsers’ bookmark managers provide.

Currently only has a popup where a new bookmark can be added by handy category filter that lets you search a suitable bookmark folder even using just the keyboard.

Planned features:

– Change icon if current URL has been bookmarked
– Add subcategory from the popup
– Edit and remove existing bookmarks
– Mobile browser support
– Bookmark multiple tabs at once
– Directory view for organising your bookmarks (ie. replacement for browser’s bookmark manager)
– Directory view will have different view modes, that enable searching, filtering, sorting, import and export of bookmarks
– Drag and drop in directory view, even between the OS file manager and the browser
– Everything should be usable and accessible without a mouse
– Optionally replace browser bookmark management
– Synchronisation of bookmarks between different browsers (maybe with a different extension) using CRDTs
